mapper.insert: INSERT INTO template_pool ( template_content, subject_id, type_id, answer_id, difficulty_grade, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) VALUES ( #{templatePool.templateContent}, #{templatePool.subjectId}, #{templatePool.typeId}, #{templatePool.answerId}, #{templatePool.difficultyGrade}, #{templatePool.gmtCreate}, #{templatePool.getModified} )
mapper.select: SELECT template_id,template_content,subject_id,type_id,answer_id,difficulty_grade,gmt_create,gmt_modified FROM template_pool WHERE subject_id = #{subjectId} AND type_id = #{typeId}
SELECT template_id, template_content, subject_id, type_id, answer_id, difficulty_grade, gmt_create, gmt_modified FROM template_pool LIMIT #{page},#{limit}
SELECT template_id, template_content, subject_id, type_id, answer_id, difficulty_grade FROM template_pool WHERE template_id=#{templateId}
SELECT template_id, template_content, subject_id, type_id, answer_id, difficulty_grade FROM template_pool WHERE subject_id=#{id}
SELECT template_id, template_content, subject_id, type_id, answer_id, difficulty_grade FROM template_pool WHERE type_id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE template_pool SET template_content = #{templatePool.templateContent}, subject_id = #{templatePool.subjectId}, type_id = #{templatePool.typeId}, difficulty_grade = #{templatePool.difficultyGrade}, gmt_modified = #{templatePool.getModified} WHERE (template_id = #{templatePool.templateId});
